name: Tchoupi
description:
This is a game just for the fun. Made with my daughter requirement (T'choupi have to escape crocodiles).

No score, no win conditions.

Any touch make tchoupi jump.

Made in 4h.

All the rights remains to their owner. If they want me to remove this game, please contact me. I make no money with it. It's just for kids to enjoy.

Sounds are from freesound and music from bensound
The crocodile is from moddb article and made by @KierEyles for chameleon-swing game.
T'choupi is made of two images captured from "T'choupi à l'école" saison 2 épisode 1

The rest is home made.

Enjoy !
